summary:
Increases the zoom amount for Eagle Eye perk to 0x 1.5x 2x 3x 4x 5x 6x 7x or 10x
Choice of stamina usage: vanilla or none
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Increases the zoom amount for Eagle Eye perk to 0x 1.5x 2x 3x 4x 5x 6x 7x or 10x
Im not entirely sure any work past 5x because of some limitation to the function, but I include them anyway
Choice of stamina usage: vanilla or none

I use FOV 90 so i required this for Eagle Eye to even be useful - if you use FOV 90 or above you will probably want 3x or more too

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\\

[heading]MY TOP MODS[/heading][b]
